item.title: Quickstart
item.description: Use this guide to quickly start running Polaris. This is not intended for production use. Prerequisites Have Docker (with Docker Compose v2) installed & running on your machine Running Run the following command: curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apache/polaris/main/getting-started/quickstart/docker-compose.yml | docker compose -f - up This command will: Create a Catalog named quickstart_catalog with MinIO-backed storage. Create a user principal quickstart_user with full access to the catalog. Once the command has been run, you will see examples on how to interact with this Polaris server in the logs.
